name: Mono- Calcium Phosphate (MCP)
shortInfo: Mono- Calcium Phosphate (MCP) Micro encapsulated Monobasic calcium phosphate
description: Mono- Calcium Phosphate (MCP) Micro encapsulated Monobasic calcium phosphate (MCP) is enriched/ fortified with essential photo chemicals with enhance the absorption of calcium and phosphorus by increasing their availability. KGV MCP is a micro encapsulated. Monobasic calcium phosphate contains one molecule of water of hydration due to its micro encapsulation the deliquescents nature (More than the calculated amount of water may be present) is suppressed.Micro- encapsulated are a controlled release  form of active ingredients which could be dispersed into a few microns to several hundred microns via physical or chemical methods
benefits: Higher absorption of calcium and phosphorus due to phytochemical
Phytochemical such as vitamins increase the absorption of these elements in the body.
It's mono calcuim phosphate content and high solubility ensure it's superior biological qualities.
Outstanding physical qualities provide for ease of handling and uniform dispersion in mixed feeds and minerals.
Helps to strengthen the bones and weight gain in livestock and poultry.
contents: The product MCP content 98.0% as unspecified assay and presence of organic phyto biochemical and herbs.
caution: Store in cool and dry place

name: Di-Calcium Phosphate (DCP)
shortInfo: Dicalcium phospahte10x organic formulation being a high quality animal feed

The nano encapsulated Dicalcium phosphate 10x is having combination of 10 herbs and organic products which is shown to improve the absorption of phosphorus in the body of the animals and birds by 10 times, hence making this product same or better performer then simple Dicalcium phosphate available in open market..
benefits: Rich golden colour of egg yolk and improve tastes
Increase over all egg quality and egg production
Stimulation of the digestive secretions of bile, mucus, saliva, and improvement of enzyme activities.
positive effects on growth and performance.
caution: Store in cool and dry place

name: Tri-Calcium Phosphate (TCP)
shortInfo: Tricalcium phosphate (TCP) feed grade in India is a mineral supplement
description: Tricalcium phosphate (TCP) feed grade in India is a mineral supplement used in animal feed to provide essential calcium and phosphorus. It's a white, odorless powder derived from sources like rock phosphate. TCP is widely available from various manufacturers and suppliers across India, often packaged in bags of 25kg.
caution: Store in cool and dry place

name: Toxin Binder
shortInfo: Brode spectrum mycotoxin absorbent suitable for all types of feed.
description: Toxin Binder is a techno organic herbal, high affinity sorbent that binds mycotoxins found in feed  in this bound form the harmful toxins pass through the alimentary tarct of the bird or animal to be voided in the faeces. Protoxin thereby helps prevent the absorbtins of mycotoxins into the body and so protects the animal against their harmful,often fatal,effects. Toxin Binder is notabsorbed by the body  its action is purely local and is a direct effect of its physical and electrical properties. Toxin Binder traps Afloxtoxins as a result of the electrostatic attraction to aluminium ions when mixed with water. It has an enormous surfacearea so that it can act as a liner inside the intestine Electronic microscope pictures have shown the intestinal cells being covered by the suspension.The electrical properties of toxin binder make it absorb bacteria and toxins in the intestineso that they can be eliminated with the clay
benefits: Has the ability  to bind wide range of mycotoxins
Is a low cost / high return on investment
Has a low effective inclusion rate in feed
Rapidly and uniformly disperses in feed during mixing.
Has no binding affinity for vitamins, minerals, drugs, and other nutrients
howToUse: Add to mixer with other ingredients and mix homogenously
caution: Store in a cool dry place

name: DL-Methionine Feed Grade 99%
description: DL-methionine is techno organic herbal,manufactured by chemical synthesis from petrochemical raw materials,and obtained a high quality product under the complete chemical reaction without any potential unreacted materials left. The manufacturing process is operated under the appropriate quality control system, which can guarantee the quality of DL-methionine.
benefits: First limiting amino acid in poultry
caution: Store in a cool , dry, ventilated warehouse. When storing large goods,you should install conductive balance equipment, and prevent the accumulation of static electricity charge.
Product should be prevented from solarization,humidity and rain.

name: L-LYSINE HCL Feed Grade 98.5%
shortInfo: L-Lysine Amino acid takes care of the development of the poultry
description: L-Lysine Amino acid takes care of the development of the poultry, brings addition to its Item Specific Rotation Heavy ContentWater Contentquality enhance the poultry growth. Using L-Lysine on a regular basis in the poultry feed.the birds grows healthier and faster and the use of rude protein would be reduced by 3-4%.The most common type of lysin used commercially and used in the poultry feed is the 98% lysin mono-Hcl It is equivalent to 78.4% of lysine amino acid that can be absorbed by the birds.
benefits: Reduces risk of recurrent herpes infection
caution: Keep in dry and cool in unopened original packing.

name: L-Threonine Feed Grade 98.5%
shortInfo: L-Threonine 98.5% is the highly purified product after fermentation.
description: L-Threonine is an techno organic herbal, essential amino acid that is added to the diet of pigs and poultry in order to extactly match the balanced amino acid requirement of the animals. In practice , L-Threonine is the second limiting amino acid for pigs and the third for poultry. Even in the low protein diets with such balanced L-Threonine content, L-Threonine can optimize growth performance and decrease the excreation of nitrogen. It is cost effective and environment friendly
caution: Keep in dry, cool, and shaded place

name: Choline Chloride 60% Corn Cob
shortInfo: Choline chloride is techno organic herbal,a kind of vitamin
description: Choline chloride is techno organic herbal,a kind of vitamin, it is the essential  component of lecithin and is very important for the nutrition and growth of the animal. The young animals cannot synthesize choline chloride by itself,so they should absorb it through feedstuff
benefits: To prevent the accumula on of fat in livers and kidneys and avoid its pathalogical changes
To enhance the health of animal and to improve its ability to anti-illness.
To increses the growth rate and laying rate of fowls and to increses the survival rate of baby pig.
To increase the growth and survival rate of fishes and promote its propagation.
To ensure the proper func oning of the nervous system of animal.
caution: Hygroscopic material,Keep dry in sealed bags, store below 120°F (50°c).Recommended storage temperature 50°-90°F(10°-32°c)

name: Chlortetracycline 15% (CTC)
shortInfo: This product is a tetracycline broad-spectrum antibiotics
description: KGV Healthcare Chlortetracycline is a broad spectrum antimicrobial drug in the feed for prophylactic purpose.Chlortetracycline (CTC) can also promote the permeation and absorption of the nourish elements, stimulating hypophysis to produce hormone and adjusting appetites. It result in obvious growth promotion for poultry, livestock and so on, also greatly incresase FCR.
benefits: Antibiotics against Gram-positive and Gram Negative bacteria
Improve the survival rate of  livestock
howToUse: Mixed feed for per 1000kg feed, add 25-75gm to pig feed (4 Months old or less) and 20-50gm to chicken (10 weeks old or less). Calculation above is of the effective ingredients.
availablePacking: Standard exported packing or as requirement
caution: Large doses of this product will cause gastro-intestinal flora. It is forbidden during laying period

name: Multienzyme
shortInfo: Multienzyme is an optimum blend of enzyme for improvement of digestibility of vegetable feeds for poultry.
description: Multienzyme is an optimum blend of enzyme for improvement of digestibility of vegetable feeds for poultry. Multienzyme is specially suited for improved energy performance of feed that contain wheat bran, soya beans, corn, rapeseed, sunflower seed, peas, etc.Multienzyme is designed to aid normal digestion increasing the energy availability and to hydrolyses non-starch polysaccharide with the result of reduction in feed conversion ratio and increase in body weight. The reduction in FCR by 7-10% and increase of 100-150gm body weight after 4th-5th week.
howToUse: The enzyme can be dose at a rate 400-500gms/ton of feed

name: Vitamin A
shortInfo: Vitamin-A Palmiatate is insoluble in water soluble in water in facts oils and hydrgenated cartons.
description: 98.5% concetra on liquid Vitamin-A Palmiatate is insoluble in water soluble in water in facts oils and hydrgenated cartons.The solvent should not contain peroxides.The recommended usage level of vitamin A palmitate is 0.05% to 0.3%
benefits: Prevent from skeletal malformation, retarded growth, reproductive failure
Ensure good growth,disease resistance & to improve fertility

Prevent vitamin A deficency disease like Wheezing, Sneezing, nostrils blocked with crusts, swollen eyes, loss of appetite,Diarrhea, Weight loss, slimy mouth, tail bobbing, dullness of feather color, listleness, depression.

name: Vitamin E
shortInfo: It treat crazy chicks disease, exudative diathesis & muscular dystrophy
description: Vitamin E is vital for immunity & reproduction in poultry & cattle. For faster growth & proper bone formation in cattle.
benefits: It treat crazy chicks disease, exudative diathesis & muscular dystrophy
To reduce incidence of ascites and sudden death syndrome in broilers
To reduce leg weakness syndrome in broiler.
To improve fertility, hatchability & egg production layers
Increase egg production, highly recommended for layers & breeders
